mapper.insert: insert into bookmark (`usersNo`, `itemNo`, `shopNo`, `itemCategoryNo`) VALUES(#{userNo }, #{itemNo }, shopno, itemcategoryno)
mapper.delete: delete from bookmark where itemNo = #{itemNo } and usersNo = #{userNo }
mapper.select: select no from bookmark where usersNo = #{userNo } and itemNo = #{itemNo }

select b.*, i.name iname, i.picture ipicture, s.name sname, s.picture spicture from bookmark b left outer join item i on b.itemNo = i.no left outer join shop s on b.shopNo = s.no where b.usersNo = #{userNo }
